name: The Last Duel (Wesley Petit, Chicoree, adrimyla)
name_original: The Last Duel (Wesley Petit, Chicoree, adrimyla)
description:
The last duel is a game where you will need very good reflexes ! Fight against another local player by pressing the correct input when the flag is raised. The first one to shoot wins !

Use aruco codes with colors under a camera and tap on right color when the flag is raised. You can also play with keyboard controls : 

  • Player 1
    • D : Red
    • B (Xbox) : Red
    • X (PlayStation) : Red
     
  • Player 2
    • Right arrow : Red
    • B (Xbox) : Red
    • X (PlayStation) : Red
